scripts.text: He's untying a cloth apron.
He's setting a plastic bin on a shelf.
scripts.translation: 남자가 선반에 플라스틱 통을 놓고 있다.

scripts.text: He's using a knife to slice some food.
He's putting some groceries in a drawer.
She's fixing her sunglasses.
She's sitting on a bench.
She's reaching into a handbag.
She's talking on the phone.
One of the women is leaning over a trash can.
scripts.translation: 여자들 중 한 명이 쓰레기통 위로 몸을 숙이고 있다.

scripts.text: One of the women is looking at a post on a bulletin board.
scripts.translation: 여자들 중 한 명이 게시판에 있는 게시물을 보고 있다.

scripts.text: One of the women is standing next to an entrance.
scripts.translation: 여자들 중 한 명이 입구 옆에 서 있다.

scripts.text: One of the women is counting money from a machine.
scripts.translation: 여자들 중 한 명이 기계에서 돈을 세고 있다.

scripts.text: A car has been parked beside a building.
A door has been propped open.
There's a sign posted on a fence.
Some plants have been arranged in a row.
scripts.translation: 화초 몇 개가 일렬로 배열되어 있다.

scripts.text: Some light fixtures are being installed.
A display case is being wiped.
A server is distributing menus.
A server is taking an order.
A vehicle is covered in snow.
Some equipment is leaning against a truck.
scripts.translation: 장비 몇 개가 트럭에 기대어 있다.

scripts.text: He's driving a vehicle through some snow.
scripts.translation: 남자가 눈밭을 뚫고 차를 몰고 있다.

scripts.text: He's closing the back of a truck.
